sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Pretrial Success Act. References in this Article to "this Act" mean this Article.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Pretrial Success Act. References in this Article to "this Act" mean this Article.

sections.heading: Intent; purposes. This Act creates a comprehensive approach to ensuring pretrial success, justice, and individual and communal well-being
sections.text: The Act minimizes the number of people detained pretrial by ensuring access to community-based pretrial supports and services.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Findings. The General Assembly finds that:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly finds that:

sections.heading: Rulemaking authority. The Department shall adopt rules as are necessary to implement all elements of this Act.
sections.text: Rulemaking authority. The Department shall adopt rules as are necessary to implement all elements of this Act.

sections.heading: The Substance Use Disorder Rate Equity Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Substance Use Disorder Rate Equity Act is repealed.

sections.heading: The Substance Use Disorder Residential and Detox Rate Equity Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Substance Use Disorder Residential and Detox Rate Equity Act is repealed.

sections.heading: The Department of Healthcare and Family Services Law of the Civil Administrative Code of Illinois is amended by repealing Section 2205-31.
sections.text: The Department of Healthcare and Family Services Law of the Civil Administrative Code of Illinois is amended by repealing Section 2205-31.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Sections 3-15, 3-25, 3-27, 3-45, 3-50, and 3-60 and Article 45 take effect July 1, 2024 and Sections 3-7, 3-11, 3-30, 3-55, and 3-57 take effect January 1, 2025
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Sections 3-15, 3-25, 3-27, 3-45, 3-50, and 3-60 and Article 45 take effect July 1, 2024 and Sections 3-7, 3-11, 3-30, 3-55, and 3-57 take effect January 1, 2025.
